snippet: l Qaeda’s branch in Yemen, which seized control over the port of Al Mukalla nearly a month ago, has barred residents from trading or chewing khat.
abstract: Al Qaeda fighters in Yemen bar residents from trading or chewing khat, stimulant that has been habit in country for centuries.
lead_paragraph: l Qaeda’s branch in Yemen, which seized control over the port of Al Mukalla nearly a month ago, has barred residents from trading or chewing khat.

headline.main: Yemen: Al Qaeda Outlaws a Stimulant
